body_html:
Okay, the CPU tests are failing because I haven't adjusted the code that creates the pip package (It still assumes that eigen is located in eigen_archive/eigen-eigen-\w+).
Not sure about the GPU tests, though.

body:
Okay, the CPU tests are failing because I haven't adjusted the code that creates the pip package (It still assumes that eigen is located in `eigen_archive/eigen-eigen-\w+`).
Not sure about the GPU tests, though.
